name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Dynamic Front-End Developer with 9+ years of experience specializing in **Angular**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **SASS**, and **LESS**. Proven expertise in delivering high-performance, user-centric web applications while maintaining cross-browser compatibility and utilizing AJAX and RESTful services. Exceptional problem-solving skills complemented by strong communication and teamwork abilities, facilitating efficient collaboration with cross-functional teams. Demonstrated adaptability and self-management in fast-paced environments, ensuring timely project delivery and high-quality code.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed responsive and dynamic web applications using **Angular**, enhancing user engagement through intuitive UI and optimized performance.
Implemented interfaces with **RESTful APIs**, improving data retrieval time by 40% and ensuring smooth integration of backend services.
Utilized **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3** to create modern web designs that increased viewport compatibility across diverse browsers by 50%.
Applied **AJAX** for asynchronous data loading, resulting in a 30% reduction in page load times and a seamless user experience.
Executed **JavaScript unit testing frameworks** to ensure code reliability and functionality, achieving 95% code coverage on critical components.
Employed **SASS** and **LESS** for advanced CSS preprocessing, streamlining the stylesheet management process and reducing CSS file sizes by 20%.
Collaborated effectively within a team of developers to troubleshoot and resolve cross-browser compatibility issues, enhancing overall code quality and maintainability.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills by prioritizing tasks, leveraging self-management techniques to meet project deadlines consistently.

Utilized **Angular** and **JavaScript** to develop dynamic and responsive user interfaces, enhancing user engagement by 30%.
Implemented **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **SASS** for crafting visually appealing web pages, achieving a page load speed improvement of **15%**.
Created **AJAX** calls to integrate with backend services, minimizing data fetch times by **20%** while maintaining application performance.
Conducted cross-browser testing and ensured compatibility using **LESS** and modern frameworks, reducing client-reported issues by **40%**.
Employed JavaScript unit testing frameworks to maintain code quality, resulting in an error reduction rate of **35%**.
Fostered effective communication and teamwork skills to collaborate with backend developers, ensuring seamless integration of **REST**ful services.
Authenticated user sessions using secure practices while managing prioritization of tasks effectively to meet project deadlines.

- Developed responsive and user-friendly web applications using **Angular**, focusing on **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **SASS**, and **LESS** to enhance user experience.
- Implemented **AJAX** solutions for seamless data retrieval, improving interactivity and loading times by **40%**.
- Collaborated with backend developers to integrate **REST**ful APIs, ensuring efficient communication between frontend and backend.
- Led the automation of unit testing using **JavaScript unit testing frameworks**, resulting in a **30%** reduction in bugs and improved code reliability.
- Conducted thorough cross-browser testing to ensure consistent application performance across multiple environments.
- Championed effective communication and teamwork within the development team to foster a productive work environment.
- Applied strong problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in a timely manner, contributing to overall project success.
- Demonstrated excellent self-management and prioritization of tasks in a fast-paced development cycle.

skills:
**Frontend Frameworks**
	Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, LESS, AJAX, React, Vue.js, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

**Backend Frameworks**
	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

	REST, Web API, RESTful API design

	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

**Other**
	Microservices, JavaScript unit testing framework, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, Problem-solving, Communication, Teamwork, Self-management, Prioritization
